body:
Hello everyone,
Sad day for me I got demoted for lack of activity on teamspeak. I really wish it didn't have to end like this but its how it goes. I really enjoyed my time on avicus but with this I will more then likely slowly fade out tell I'm gone for good. Hope to see all of you around.

Pel- The one who accepted my ref application and changed how I played avicus. Without you I would just have just been a regular player.
Cyanide- The one who saw something in me and fought to get me on the staff team. You were a good trainer :P.
Oscar- Always there to help.
Vobaseball- Gave great advice early on.
Snow- Could always count on you.
Grape- Could always count on as well.
Peachy- Great admin the many times.
Hipsterpug- Good friend and awesome person :)

Some others I can't think of right now.

If there is a way I can fix it I'll try.

Anyways, goodbye.
-Dill
body_tagged:

Cyanide- The one who saw something in me and fought to get me on the staff team. You were a good trainer :P.
Oscar- Always there to help.
Vobaseball- Gave great advice early on.
Snow- Could always count on you.
Grape- Could always count on as well.
Peachy- Great admin the many times.
Hipsterpug- Good friend and awesome person :)

If there is a way I can fix it I'll try.

Anyways, goodbye.
-Dill
title: My demotion

replies.body: Ahh crap Dil, not the way I wanted to log on .-. You are a great guy, stay around the community?
replies.body_tagged: Ahh crap Dil, not the way I wanted to log on .-. You are a great guy, stay around the community?

replies.body:
:.( dil I promise you that you were one of the most trusted players on this server. And when we promoted you, we knew that you were the best choice out of all of the others. You were the one that started off the handpicking system, I'm so sorry it had to end this way, and I'm sorry that some people looked the other way. You're the first player I mentored and you were my last. And I'm happy to say that you helped me a lot and sticked with me till the end. Please stay in touch bud. 



Its been been a pleasure having you with us. And its personally my pleasure to have worked with you :.(((
replies.body_tagged:
:.( dil I promise you that you were one of the most trusted players on this server. And when we promoted you, we knew that you were the best choice out of all of the others. You were the one that started off the handpicking system, I'm so sorry it had to end this way, and I'm sorry that some people looked the other way. You're the first player I mentored and you were my last. And I'm happy to say that you helped me a lot and sticked with me till the end. Please stay in touch bud. 



Its been been a pleasure having you with us. And its personally my pleasure to have worked with you :.(((

replies.body:
Dil,

I'm very sorry that it had to end this way as well. You were a great asset to the server and staff team and an extremely nice guy. I hope you still stick around and hopefully you can find your way back. I appreciate your work for the server, hope to see you around. o/
replies.body_tagged:
Dil,

I'm very sorry that it had to end this way as well. You were a great asset to the server and staff team and an extremely nice guy. I hope you still stick around and hopefully you can find your way back. I appreciate your work for the server, hope to see you around. o/

replies.body: He got demoted for inactivity on teamspeak? Is that really worth it?
replies.body_tagged: He got demoted for inactivity on teamspeak? Is that really worth it?

replies.body:
Why would you demote one of your better moderators just because he was inactive on a not-so-popular platform?
TeamSpeak isn't exactly thriving...this demotion achieved nothing, it did not benefit the staff team any futher, only damaged it by losing a reliable moderator..such a waste of a dedicated and talented person.

Thanks for for the work that you put in dil, thinking back to when you were a Jr, you've grown and learnt a lot.
Thanks for everything mate.

:)

Thanks for for the work that you put in dil, thinking back to when you were a Jr, you've grown and learnt a lot.
Thanks for everything mate.

:)

replies.body: crying
replies.body_tagged: crying

replies.body:
We have emphasized to the Moderators (specifically Dil) multiple times about TeamSpeak activity, especially when he hasn't been active at all since he was promoted.

We went very easy on him with TeamSpeak, as we need Mods to be active to make it thrive, and still he contributed nothing to his duties after months of us asking.

So it did involve TeamSpeak, yes. But it also involved a lack of doing his duties, ignoring numerous warnings, and ignorance of an entire Avicus service.

:)

So it did involve TeamSpeak, yes. But it also involved a lack of doing his duties, ignoring numerous warnings, and ignorance of an entire Avicus service.

:)

replies.body: Dill it's really sad for you to get demoted. You were an awesome Moderator who responded to me when there is trouble. I would like to thank you for the great service you did to the community. Even though you don't know me, I still remember you going from Default -> Diamond -> Ref -> Jr Mod -> Mod. Honestly, I did not expect you to get demoted and I expected you to get Sr Mod, because of how good of a mod you are. Well, I hope good things will appear in your future, Good Luck!

Honestly, I did not expect you to get demoted and I expected you to get Sr Mod, because of how good of a mod you are. Well, I hope good things will appear in your future, Good Luck!
